data.title: Rib Fest Schedule
data.meta_description: View the schedule of events for the annual Acrisure Stadium Kickoff and Rib Festival in Pittsburgh, PA, including the FREE concert schedules and lineups.
data.text:
Daily Activities

Ribs from nationally renowned rib vendors

Festival foods, including funnel cakes, lemonade, and more provided by Seivers

Jim Beam “The Believe In Beam Experience,” FedEx Great Hall, Steelers Pro Shop, Hall of Honor Museum (ticket required), Rides, Games, Vendors & more!

Bluespire Kitchen’s Interactive Kitchen and Music Display.

Fri, Sun, and Mon: Steely McBeam appearances & Steelers Experience.

Sat and Sun: Pittsburgh Knights Gaming Display

*Entertainment and activities subject to change

Thursday, August 29, 2024

4:00pm - 9:00pm

Daily activities

The Beats & BBQ DJ Showdown

7:00pm - 9:00pm

Hosted by DJ Petey C, this interactive live event features the area’s best DJ’s, dancers, musicians, contests, and more in a one-of-a-kind extravaganza.

Steelers Pro Shop open

10:00am - 7:00pm

11:00am - 3:00pm
